basic.description:
This course examines Classical Hollywood Cinema from the early 1940s until its demise at the end of the 1950s.
NOTE    Also offered online. Consult Continuing and Distance Studies. Learning Hours may vary.
LEARNING HOURS    108 (36L;24Lb;48P)
basic.subject: FILM
basic.title: Hollywood: The Dream Factory

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite    [(FILM110 or FILM104 and FILM106) or FILM240 or FILM260) and a GPA of 2.60
